title: New Zealand Oceanfront Retreat & Spa in Waikato Region with All-Inclusive Dining & Massages
description:
Leave the world behind and immerse yourself in the natural beauty of New Zealandâ€™s Waikato region at Te Whaanga Retreat & Spa, surrounded by boundless lush greenery, world-class surf and black sands. Wake up to the rhythm of waves and melodies of birdsong at this oceanfront oasis, before submerging yourself into bliss at the pool, and indulging in a tension-melting massage at the onsite spa.

Join a private yoga session overlooking the Tasman Sea or embark on a guided walk through the pristine native bush. If an afternoon indoors is calling, retreat to the secluded onsite library and games room.
